languages.text: "Успокойся, если бы я пришел сюда для задержания, то разговор бы начался с люмен-гранаты и подавляющего огня".
"You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."
languages.original_text: "Успокойся, если бы я пришел сюда для задержания, то разговор бы начался с люмен-гранаты и подавляющего огня".

traits.locale_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."
"You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."
"You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."
"You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."
"You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."
"You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

languages.text: “别紧张。如果我真的是来执法的，那这场谈话恐怕会以闪光弹和火力压制开场。”
languages.original_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

traits.locale_text: “别紧张。如果我真的是来执法的，那这场谈话恐怕会以闪光弹和火力压制开场。”

languages.text: «Puede relajarse. Si hubiera venido a detener a alguien, esta conversación habría empezado con una granada cegadora y fuego de supresión».
languages.original_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

traits.locale_text: «Puede relajarse. Si hubiera venido a detener a alguien, esta conversación habría empezado con una granada cegadora y fuego de supresión».

languages.text: « Rassurez-vous. Si j'étais ici pour arrêter quelqu'un, cette conversation aurait débuté par une grenade aveuglante et quelques tirs de suppression. »
languages.original_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

traits.locale_text: « Rassurez-vous. Si j'étais ici pour arrêter quelqu'un, cette conversation aurait débuté par une grenade aveuglante et quelques tirs de suppression. »

languages.text: 「安心しろ。もし誰かを拘束しに来たのなら、この会話は閃光弾と制圧射撃から始まっていただろう」
languages.original_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

traits.locale_text: 「安心しろ。もし誰かを拘束しに来たのなら、この会話は閃光弾と制圧射撃から始まっていただろう」

languages.text: "Gerilmene gerek yok. Buraya birini tutuklamaya gelmiş olsaydım konuşmaya ışıl bomba ve bastırıcı ateşle giriş yapardım."
languages.original_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

traits.locale_text: "Gerilmene gerek yok. Buraya birini tutuklamaya gelmiş olsaydım konuşmaya ışıl bomba ve bastırıcı ateşle giriş yapardım."

languages.text: "Ihr könnt Euch entspannen. Wollte ich jemanden verhaften, hätte unser Gespräch mit einer Blendgranate und etwas Unterstützungsfeuer begonnen."
languages.original_text: "You can relax. If I were here to detain someone, this conversation would have started with a flash grenade and some suppressive fire."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt Euch entspannen. Wollte ich jemanden verhaften, hätte unser Gespräch mit einer Blendgranate und etwas Unterstützungsfeuer begonnen."
